pullRequest.body:
Adds dates to results deprecated in #12132 and #12078.

---

nodes.body: @grunweg it turns out `deprecated` has support for dates in lean 4.8, so let's shelve this PR and wait for that to land: https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/3968
I know; I'm eagerly awaiting the upgrade :-) Sure, waiting is fine with me!
Except for the date issue, this PR looks good to me.
With the Lean upgrade just landed, this PR should be ready to be updated!
@grunweg how's that?

Except for the date issue, this PR looks good to me.
